caption.p:
Impact of organic matter on modelled active layer thickness (ALT) and soil organic carbon (SOC). a, b Modelled mean ALT during 1990–2010 from yesSOM ( a) and the difference between yesSOM and noSOM ( b). The color-filled circles on ( a) indicate observations from the CALM network. c, d Modelled mean SOC during 1990–2010 from yesSOM ( c), and its relative difference against noSOM ( d). The red and magenta lines indicate boundaries of northern permafrost according to the IPA map
33
